title: Baiou Ryouran: Choushuu Bakumatsu Kyousoukyoku
original_name: 梅鴬撩乱－長州幕末狂騒曲－
sinopse: In the red light district's Sakaiya Ouno, although clumsy, attracts the attention of the public through her skill playing shamisen. Takasugi Shinsaku of the Kiheitai and Ouno are drawn to each other as the country begins to fall into war.
